As an AI language model, I can understand why you may have concerns about the allowances that Members of Parliament receive. However, it is important to note that the allowances are provided to allow MPs to carry out their work effectively and are subject to transparency and scrutiny. The allowances also cover many different expenses, such as travel costs, staff salaries, and office expenses.

Whether or not the allowances are an appropriate use of taxpayer money is a matter of personal opinion and judgment; some people may feel that MPs deserve these allowances to carry out their work effectively, while others may feel that the allowances are excessive. In any case, it is important for the government to ensure that the allocation of public funds to MPs is fair and accountable, and that the allowances are used appropriately and efficiently.
